Merchandise Manager– Woven

Job Context
Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) is a multinational apparel buying hub and exporter. The organization is marching ahead with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions and value-added services to end products for the textile industries. DSL is committed to achieve global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. Global headquarter of Dongyi sourcing is located at North Point, Hong Kong and Global corporate office is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dongyi Sourcing Ltd is searching potential candidates for Merchandise Manager -Woven position

 

Job Responsibilities

  1. Communication with Buyers & Suppliers.

  2. Coordinate with factory team for proper & in time production & shipment.

  3. Advise factory/production/quality team on fabric, production, quality related technical issues as efficient/experienced trouble shooter.

  4. To follow up running orders, all approvals including samples and accessories, PP meetings, yarn and fabric status in order to start production and on time shipment.

  5. To prepare price quotations for new orders based on customer requirement.

  6. To ensure supplier’s PI and other commercial issues with coordinated effort.

  7. To follow with commercial department to ensure all back to back LCs for yarn and related accessories done in due time.

  8. To ensure Trim cards are prepared and send to customer for approval in due time.

  9. To monitor quality inspection report on bulk fabric and inspection report on garment production to prevent any low-quality products from shipment.

  10. To prepare and maintain time and action plan and execute accordingly to maintain customer delivery date.

  11. Follow the process & procedures of buyers Assist the local procurement team to sourcing trims/accessories as required maintaining the standard.

  12. Need to arrange supplier refreshment training each & every alternative month to make them aware of the process.

  13. To maintain good environment and discipline in merchandising department.

  14. Any special task/assignment as required for the position as given by the company.

Employment Status

Full-time

 

Requirements:

  1. Graduation from any reputed university on Textile subject.

  2. Strong knowledge on Merchandise Manager – Woven, regulations, and industry standards.

  3. 8-10 years working experience from both factory & any reputed buying house.

  4. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail.

  5. Demonstrated leadership and team management abilities.

  6. Effective communication and presentation skills.

  7. English written & spoken are mandatory.

Additional Requirements:

  1. Age limit 35 years

  2. Fluent in English both written & email communication

  3. Proven experience as a garment technologist or relevant role

  4. Thorough knowledge of methodologies of garment technologist and standards

  5. Excellent numerical skills and understanding of data analysis/statistical methods

  6. Excellent organizational and leadership abilities

Reliable and Trustworthy

 

Additional Requirements

  • Only males are allowed to apply

  • Languages: Good written and spoken English and Bengali;

  • Knowledge: Good knowledge of Information Technology;

  • Computer Skills: Proficient in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Power Point, Access),and Outlook.

  • Capacity to define priorities, adaptation, ability to work in a team with multicultural environment;

  • Sense of responsibility and confidentiality;

  • Must be a team player and flexible to work with different tasks under stress.

Job Location

Dhaka (Uttara)

 

Salary

Negotiable

 

Compensation & Other Benefits

  1. Mobile bill

  2. Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize

  3. Salary Review: Yearly

  4. Festival Bonus: 2

  5. Performance bonus

  6. On-time salary – Current month’s salary is paid in current monthly only (last working day of each month)

  7. Health Insurance

  8. Medical Insurance

  9. Long-term benefits

  10. PF

If you are passionate to good fit for the position please send your updated CV to

career@dongyi.hk

by 14th July 2024

Note: Please Mention the Position Name in Email Subject.
